price: munaafiqoota gammachiisi. Adabni laalessaan isaaniif jira jechuudhaan.
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
